channel.title: I cant even connect to my own server! Error Connecting?
channel.description: Hello all, i have a server that i want to run, and i have the source and client, but when i try and run the no-ip on the client, its error connecting to server? can someone please help me? Thank you!

item.title: I cant even connect to my own server! Error Connecting?
item.dc:creator: @Hello_RSPS Hello RSPS
item.description:
@Hello_RSPS wrote:

Did u even portforwarded? If yes, than u did it wrong.
Ppl can also join ur server with HAMACHI. (No portforwarding or no-ip needed!)
I can help u with that if u want, simply PM me (only for making a HAMACHI server)

item.title: I cant even connect to my own server! Error Connecting?
item.dc:creator: @studsparky studsparky
item.description:
@studsparky wrote:

yeah, i made a no-ip, but when i try and log on with that no-ip it takes a while and then says Error Connecting…? please help someone

okay, i made a no-ip from a website, and when i type the no-ip into the server for it to work, it says… error connecting to -----scape.

how do i make the server work? the no-ip wont connect im guessing? ive been trying to figure this out a while!

please help, thanks.

Read full topic
